items.title: Five dead in suicide bombing in Pakistan
items.description: Authorities have described the attack as a "foiled terrorist plot", noting that the attackers were gunned down at the gate.

items.title: Fifty children escape after mass school abduction in Nigeria
items.description: The raid on a Christian school came amid a surge of attacks by armed groups in the African nation.

items.title: 'No one will support it': Ukraine's soldiers react to US peace plan
items.description: Ukrainian soldiers at the front are angry, defiant and resigned after US plan became public.

items.title: Bollywood's 'He-Man' Dharmendra dies at 89
items.description: Best known for the iconic role of Veeru in the all-time great Sholay, Dharmendra was India's "most handsome actor".

items.title: US and Ukraine signal peace plan progress after Geneva talks
items.description: Both sides say "intensive work" will take place on outstanding issues following talks on a US-backed plan to end the war.
